tasks.title: Storage Schema, Data Models & Configuration
tasks.summary: Added 5 distributed models (DistributedNode, TaskLease, ExecutionIdempotency, ClusterLeader, TaskEvent) to models.py. Extended TaskModel with 6 nullable fields. Created DistributedConfig dataclass with from_env() and validate(). Added config registry integration. Created dialect-aware migration 003. 28 new tests pass. Full suite: 1472 pass, 0 regressions.

tasks.title: Leader Services (NodeRegistry, LeaseManager, LeaderElection, PlacementEngine, IdempotencyManager)
tasks.summary: Implemented 5 distributed services: NodeRegistry (register/deregister/heartbeat/stale+dead detection), LeaseManager (acquire/renew/release/cleanup), LeaderElection (try_acquire/renew/release/cleanup/is_leader), PlacementEngine (constraint-based node filtering), IdempotencyManager (SHA-256 keygen/cache/store). 86 new tests, all pass. Fixed infinite recursion bugs in _utcnow(). Fixed pyright type errors with cast(). Full suite: 1530 pass, 0 regressions.

tasks.title: Worker Runtime
tasks.summary: Implemented WorkerRuntime with async polling/execution loop, lease lifecycle (acquire/renew/release), heartbeat, idempotency checking, concurrency control via asyncio.Semaphore, and graceful shutdown. 17 new tests, all pass. Full suite: 1547 pass, 0 regressions.

tasks.title: Integration, Role Selection & End-to-End Validation
tasks.summary: Implemented DistributedRuntime coordinator with role selection state machine (auto/leader/worker/observer), leader background tasks (lease cleanup, node health, leader renewal with demotion on failure), worker runtime integration, and graceful shutdown with lease release. 16 new tests, all pass. Full suite: 1563 pass, 0 regressions.
